source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_00<tab>Master Mogzin is a moogle with a plan.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_00<tab>バール・レス広場の団長のモグジンは、冒険者のことをチラ見している。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_01<tab>With all parties having agreed to put aside their petty differences to address the grave matter of the madness that has taken Gullinbursti, Master Mogzin has decided on a plan of action. While he and Ohl Deeh gather information about Gullinbursti's current whereabouts, you and the deftarm will pursue the mysterious masked assailant in hopes of gaining insight as to what precisely is afflicting the ancient dragon, and how he might be returned to his benevolent self. At the deftarm's suggestion, you split up to question the residents of Bahrr Lehs regarding aught they may have seen or heard.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_01<tab>モグジンから、冒険者とウデキキで仮面の男の行方を追って、グリンブルスティに何が起こったのかを、追及することを頼まれた。モグジンとオル・ディーは、グリンブルスティの行方を追いにいった。ドラヴァニア雲海のバール・レス広場で仮面の男の情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_02<tab>A Temple Knight with a disturbingly nonchalant attitude to these troublesome developments informs you that the masked man had personally asked him where he might find a dragon of particular puissance, in response to which the hapless fool unwittingly volunteered his knowledge of Gullinbursti. The full implications of this remain a mystery, but mayhap the deftarm has gleaned some new information that will serve to shed light on the whole affair.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_02<tab>情報を集めたところ、仮面の男は、強いドラゴン族を狙っていて、グリンブルスティが標的にされたことがわかった。バール・レス広場の「ウデキキ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_03<tab>The deftarm is not entirely sure what to make of the testimony you gathered, but reveals that in the meantime he has learned that your quarry has already moved on from the Churning Mists. He proposes that you return to the surface together, and seek the wisdom of the storyteller at Loth ast Vath before continuing on in your pursuit.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_03<tab>ウデキキに報告した。彼によると仮面の男は、ドラヴァニア雲海から出たようだ。地上へ戻り、ヴァスの塚へ寄っていくことになった。高地ドラヴァニアのヴァスの塚にいる「ストーリーテラー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_04<tab>You make your way to Loth ast Vath, but the deftarm is nowhere to be seen. While confident that your pupil has not been led astray by the whispers of the Onemind as he had in the past, the storyteller nevertheless fears for his fellow Vath's safety. You strike out for the hinterlands with the hope that nothing dire has befallen your friend.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_04<tab>ストーリーテラーと話したが、ウデキキが帰っていないと言われた。高地ドラヴァニアのスモーキングウェイストで「ウデキキ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_05<tab>You sigh in relief to see that the deftarm is safe, and had merely taken a detour to rescue the goblin lass Drydox from an ambush by the Onemind. Your loyal apprentice bears troubling news, however, as he relates that the assailants set upon the girl with a cruel, crazed savagery entirely uncharacteristic of the highly regimented Gnath. When Drydox then reveals that she heard gunshots shortly prior to the attack, the deftarm makes the obvious connection: the masked man responsible for Gullinbursti's madness is surely close at hand. Identifying his destination as the forest, you plot a course for Tailfeather to consult with the hunter Marcechamp.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_05<tab>ウデキキを見つけた。彼は、途中で「繋がりし者たち」に襲われたドライドクスを助けていたようだ。ドライドクスによると、森の方から変わった銃声が聞こえたという。ウデキキは仮面の男の銃だと推定し、テイルフェザーへ向かうことになった。高地ドラヴァニアのテイルフェザーにいる「マルスシャン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_06<tab>Marcechamp, much to his own chagrin, is keenly familiar with the masked man you pursue. He explains that he is an adventurer of ill repute and renown, known far and wide for accepting all manner of nefarious assignments and seeing them through with lethal precision. When the deftarm restates his resolve, undeterred by these grave warnings, the hunter relents and shares his knowledge of your quarry's whereabouts. Promising your determined pupil that you will only intercede if absolutely necessary, together you strike out for the Convictory in the western highlands of Coerthas.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_06<tab>マルスシャンと話したところ、追っている仮面の男は「仮面の冒険者」と呼ばれている、悪評の絶えない腕利きの冒険者だという。仮面の冒険者は、テイルフェザーに寄って、クルザス西部高地へ向かったようだ。クルザス西部高地の聖フィネア連隊の露営地にいる「ジャントゥロー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_07<tab>You arrive at the Convictory to see that Jantellot, too, has had an inopportune encounter with the notorious masked marauder, having lost his prized manacutter─and very nearly, one of his prized men─at the villain's hand. While making it clear that this is not an opponent to be trifled with, he does not begrudge you information regarding where the man might be found, in hopes that you and the deftarm might be able to bring the man to justice. In the face of increasingly worrisome reports on the masked man and the full threat that he poses, your apprentice remains undaunted, and as his master, you resolve to stick by his side until the job is through.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_SEQ_07<tab>ジャントゥローと話したところ、仮面の冒険者に部下を半殺しにされ、連隊で買ったマナカッターを奪われたらしい。仮面の冒険者は、アバラシア雲海の方へ向かったようだ。ウデキキは、依頼を最後までこなしてやると意気込むのだった。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_00<tab>Ask around about the masked man at Bahrr Lehs.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_00<tab>バール・レス広場で情報を集める

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_01<tab>Report to the deftarm.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_01<tab>ウデキキに報告

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Vath storyteller at Loth ast Vath.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_02<tab>ヴァスの塚のストーリーテラーと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_03<tab>Search for the Vath deftarm at the Smoldering Wastes.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_03<tab>スモーキングウェイストでウデキキを探す

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Marcechamp.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_04<tab>マルスシャンと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Jantellot at the Convictory.
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TODO_05<tab>聖フィネア連隊の露営地のジャントゥローと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_OHLDEEH_000_000<tab>The madness in those eyes...that was not the Gullinbursti I know! That masked man is behind this somehow─I'm certain of it!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_OHLDEEH_000_000あんなの、本当のダンナじゃねぇよ！
きっと、「仮面の男」が小細工したに違いねぇ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TARRESSON_000_001<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TARRESSON_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_002<tab><click> <click> Have you ever seen a dragon so angry, Master? I had not until now, and...I am scared.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_002シシシシシ……なんだか、大変なことになったね。
あのドラゴン族、普通じゃなかったよ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOGZIN_000_005<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I would beseech the aid of you and your deft-armed disciple, kupo. Pray pursue this masked marauder, and find out the truth behind the madness that has taken Gullinbursti!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOGZIN_000_005センセイとウデキキに折り入って頼みがあるくぽ。
ふたりに、例の「仮面の男」の行方を追って、
グリンブルスティさんに何が起こったのか、突き止めてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_006<tab><click> <click> Now <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> is a task worthy of an adventurer! Mark my words, my moogle friend─Master and I will track down this mysterious and dangerous foe!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_006シシシシシ……そういうことなら、任せてくれ！
師匠とオイラで、必ずそいつを見つけ出して締め上げてやるよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOGZIN_000_007<tab>A thousand thank-yous, kupo! Might I suggest that you start by asking around here in Bahrr Lehs? Perhaps some of them have heard or seen something of the man we seek.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOGZIN_000_007ありがとうくぽ！
他にも「仮面の男」を目撃した者がいないか、
まずは、広場で情報を集めることからお願いするくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOGZIN_000_008<tab>As for myself and Ohl Deeh, we will see what we might learn about Gullinbursti's current whereabouts. Tarresson, might I trouble you to watch over the plaza while we are away?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOGZIN_000_008オヤカタ、モグはオル・ディーと一緒に、
グリンブルスティさんの行方を追うくぽ！
だから、それまで広場の留守を頼みたいくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TARRESSON_000_009<tab>You would suggest that a greybeard like myself can offer naught else to your cause? Ohoho, but I jest. Rest assured that you will find not a single stone out of place on your return. Go in safety, friend Mogzin!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TARRESSON_000_009ほっほっほ、この老いぼれにできることは、
留守番ぐらいのことじゃろうて、任せておくがいい。
それでは、グリンブルスティ殿のことは頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_010<tab>At last, Master, a task worthy of our skills! Let us split up, see what we can learn about this masked villain. I shall question the moogles in this area. Would you be so kind as to speak to those gathered around the fountain? We can meet up here when our tasks are done. Share what we have learned.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_010よーし、さっそく「仮面の男」の情報を集めよう。
オイラはこの辺りのモーグリ族から聞いておくから、
師匠には噴水の辺りを頼むよ……済んだらまたここに来てくれよな。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_015<tab>Have you spoken to the moogles and knights around the fountain? As for me, my own investigation is still in progress. Let us meet up here when we have learned all there is to learn.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_015よーし、さっそく「仮面の男」の情報を集めよう。
オイラはこの辺りのモーグリ族から聞いておくから、
師匠には噴水の辺りを頼むよ……済んだらまたここに来てくれよな。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TARRESSON_000_016<tab>In my younger days, I would have been ill content to stay behind while my companions were out adventuring, but today? These old bones could use a respite, and between you and this deftarm, Mogzin and Ohl Deeh, I know that the matter is in capable hands.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_TARRESSON_000_016グリンブルスティ殿のことは、モグジンとオル・ディーに任せた。
「仮面の男」のことは、冒険者殿とウデキキ殿に任せたぞ。
ワシも若ければ、同行したいところじゃがのう……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOG02383_000_020<tab>D-Did I see a masked man, you ask? Did I ever, kupo! He strolled in brandishing that fearsome firearm of his and started picking off lesser dragons left and right! Th-Then when the coast was clear, he dashed off toward old Gullinbursti's place!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOG02383_000_020仮面をつけたヒトなら、モグも見かけたくぽ。
この辺りで、邪竜様の眷属たちを片っ端から倒していたくぽ。
本当におそろしかったくぽ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOG02383_000_021<tab>Wh-Why didn't I follow him!? I prefer my pom attached to my head, thank you very much! If you're going after him, I'd encourage you to be very, <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> careful. I don't know what he's up to, but I can assure you it's no good, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOG02383_000_021その後、グリンブルスティさんのところに向かったけど、
いったいぜんたい、何が目的くぽ……？
もう争い事はカンベンくぽ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_KOUHEI02383_000_022<tab>A masked man? Sure, I saw him. Exchanged a few words with him, for that matter. He asked if I knew of any particularly ancient and formidable dragons in the area, so I directed him to Gullinbursti.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_KOUHEI02383_000_022仮面をつけた男？　そいつとなら、言葉も交わしたよ。
この辺りに強いドラゴン族はいないかって聞かれたから、
古き翼のグリンブルスティ殿なら、強いはずだって答えたんだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_KOUHEI02383_000_023<tab>Gullinbursti's been attacked, you say!? The Fury take me! I do hope that wasn't <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> fault...
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_KOUHEI02383_000_023……か、仮面の男がグリンブルスティ殿を襲っただって？
ごめんよ、そんなことになるとは思わなかったんだ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOG02383_000_025<tab>I-If you do come across that masked man, ah, you didn't hear anything from me! S-Say it's a promise...pretty please, kupo?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MOG02383_000_025仮面をつけたヒトなら、
この辺りのドラゴン族を倒しまくっていたくぽ。
グリンブルスティさんまで狙うなんて、何が目的くぽ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_KOUHEI02383_000_026<tab>Everyone in these parts knows Gullinbursti. If I hadn't been the one to tell the masked man, he would have found out from one of my colleagues in due time. If anything, I saved them the trouble and anguish of being the one responsible. Surely you agree?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_KOUHEI02383_000_026仮面をつけた男に、強いドラゴン族はいないかって聞かれたから、
古き翼のグリンブルスティ殿なら、強いはずだって答えたんだ。
ごめんよ、そんなことになるとは思わなかったんだよ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_030<tab><click> <click> ...I see. So it would seem this masked marauder set his sights on Gullinbursti for his power and puissance. Interesting. Very interesting!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_030シシシシシ……なるほど。
仮面の男は、強いドラゴン族を狙っていて、
あのグリンブルスティが標的にされたってことだね……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_031<tab>From my own questionings, I have learned that our quarry has since been sighted in Sohm Al. It would seem he has already left the Churning Mists behind. We must give chase, yes, and return to the surface!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_031オイラは、仮面の男がソーム・アルの方へ向かったって聞いたよ。
どうやら、もうドラヴァニア雲海から出ちまったみたいだ。
オイラたちも、後を追って地上へ戻ろうか。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_032<tab>On the way, I would pay a brief visit to Loth ast Vath. I would share this news with the storyteller, and see what wisdom he might share with us. And with that, let us see whose legs are faster─I shall race you there, Master!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_032それから、ついでにヴァスの塚へ寄っていこう。
「ストーリーテラー」に経過を報告しておきたいんだ。
よし、どっちが先に塚に着くか、競争だ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_STORYTELLER_000_040<tab><click> <click> The deftarm? I have not seen him. Could it be that the Onemind once again calls out to him? But no. Even were it so, that one's mind has grown too strong. Still, I worry. Pray find him, that our minds may rest easy.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_STORYTELLER_000_040シシシシシ……ウデキキはまだ帰っていないぞ。
まさか、また自我を……いや、ありえん。
道中を探してみてはくれんか？

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_STORYTELLER_000_045<tab><click> <click> The deftarm will never again fall prey to the whispers of the Onemind. This I know, and believe without doubt. Still, I worry for his safety. Pray find him, adventurer.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_STORYTELLER_000_045シシシシシ……ウデキキはまだ帰っていないぞ。
まさか、また自我を……いや、ありえん。
道中を探してみてはくれんか？

source:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_DRYDOX_000_046Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Drydox was hunting for nanka eggs when walkybugs calling themselves “the Onemind” sneakystepped up from behind, started shooting their shootysticks. Deftarm came, saved Drydox from becoming holey-cheese.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_DRYDOX_000_046シュコォ……シュコォ……
「繋がりし者たち」現れて　問答無用で襲われた
そこに　ウデキキ駆けつけて　あっという間に　倒してくれたの。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_050<tab><click> <click> Forgive me, Master. On my way to Loth ast Vath, I found Drydox here in distress, surrounded by the Onemind. I did only what any adventurer would do. What any adventurer must do!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_050シシシシシ……師匠、塚に向かう途中、
ドライドクスが、こいつらに襲われていたから、助けていたんだ。

source:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_DRYDOX_000_051Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Drydox was hunting for nanka eggs when walkybugs calling themselves “the Onemind” sneakystepped up from behind, started shooting their shootysticks. Deftarm came, saved Drydox from becoming holey-cheese.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_DRYDOX_000_051シュコォ……シュコォ……
ゴブの好物　ナンカの卵　獲ってたら
「繋がりし者たち」現れて　問答無用で襲われた。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_052<tab>There was something...<var 1A 02 /var>strange<var 1A 01 /var> about these Onemind, Master. They were not the Onemind I know. The Onemind, you too have seen. They strike with perfect precision. But these ones...they set upon us with a savage and almost uncontrollable rage. Strange, very strange...
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_052でも、こいつら様子がおかしかったんだ。
いつもなら、整然と連携してくるのに、
てんでばらばらに、がむしゃらに襲ってきた感じだった。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_DRYDOX_000_053<tab>Now that deftarm mentions it, Drydox heard sound before walkybugs attack. It went <var 1A 02 /var>boom<var 1A 01 /var>, but it was not the <var 1A 02 /var>boom<var 1A 01 /var> of walkybug shootysticks. No, it was much, much scarier. Drydox heard it from the forest as well...
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_DRYDOX_000_053そういえば　襲われる前　変わった銃声　聴いたのよ
グナース族の火砲とは　まるで違う　変な音
その銃声　森の方からも　聴こえたわ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_054<tab>Did you hear that, Master!? There can be no doubt of it─our quarry is up to something here as well! We must make for the forest! Yes, to Tailfeather!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_054銃声だって？　きっと仮面の男に違いない！
森の方ってことは、チョコボの森だな……。
よし、テイルフェザーへ行ってみよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_055<tab>Worry not. I will tell the Storyteller that we are safe from harm. Please go visit Marcechamp and see if all is well. I will join you with all speed!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_055師匠、ストーリーテラーには、オイラが報告しておくから、
先にテイルフェザーの「マルスシャン」のもとへ行っててくれ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_DRYDOX_000_056<tab>Deftarm looks as happy as Drydox does when she finds a trove of nanka eggs! Drydox is happy for Deftarm, but worries for his safety. Uplander will be careful too, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_DRYDOX_000_056ウデキキ　なんだかんだで　楽しそう
でもでも　そんなときこそ　油断大敵　気をつけて！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_STORYTELLER_000_058<tab><click> <click> Relieved I am to hear the deftarm is safe, but it would seem you pursue a far more menacing foe. Still, I trust that he will be safe with a great hunter like you at his side.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_STORYTELLER_000_058シシシシシ……ウデキキから報告は聞いておる。
何やら、危険な者を追っているらしいが、
ヒトの狩人がついているなら安心だ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_060<tab>Oho, look who's back. What brings you to Tailfeather, friend? That Deftarm got you on another wild chocobo chase, I reckon?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_060おう、お前さんか。
今度は、いったいどうしたんだ？
ウデキキがまた、面倒でも持ち込んだのか？

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_061<tab><pant> <pant> We chase something far more frightful than chocobos, Marcechamp!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_061シシシシシ……まあ、そんなところさ。
ちょっと、マルスシャンに聞きたいことがあってね……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_062<tab>I come on behalf of the moogles of Moghome. I ask you: have you encountered a masked man brandishing a gun in this forest?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_062モーグリ族の依頼で、ある男を追っているんだけど、
この辺りで、仮面をつけた銃使いの男を見かけてないかい？

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_063<tab>'Fraid I have indeed, as much as I'd like to say otherwise. See, the man's been makin' quite a name for himself in these parts─and it ain't a good one. Had the misfortune of runnin' into him myself not hours ago.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_063そいつはどうやら、「仮面の冒険者」のことのようだな。
最近になって姿を現すようになった奴で、悪評の絶えん男だ。
……ついさっきも、テイルフェザーに立ち寄っていったぞ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_064<tab>He came here, you say!? Where did he go!? You must tell me, Marcechamp! I must know!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_064ここに来たのか！
それで、どこへ向かったんだ？
なあ、早く教えてくれ！　頼むよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_065<tab>Listen to me, Deftarm, and listen well. If you know what's good for you, you'll walk out of here the way you came, and forget anythin' and everythin' you ever heard or saw about that man.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_065ウデキキよ、悪いことは言わねぇ、
今度ばかりは手を引いた方がいいぜ……相手が悪すぎる。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_066<tab>The man you're after is an adventurer, but not one o' the nice ones like your master here. Aye, he's nothin' short o' the most ruthless assassins our realm has ever seen─a cold-blooded killer who's never met a job too dirty or dangerous for his likin'. Nor one he has failed to carry out with lethal perfection.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_066「仮面の冒険者」は、無慈悲な殺人から無益な破壊行為まで、
どんな汚い依頼でも請け負う、極悪非道な奴だという。
それも、仕事は完璧にこなす相当な腕利きらしい……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_067<tab>An adventurer, you say!? Why, who better to pursue this man than Master and myself! Yes, this is our duty! Our calling!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_067シシシシシ……腕利きの冒険者か……。
それなら、望むところだ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_068<tab>Did you hear a single bloody word I─!? <sigh> Sometimes I don't even know why I bloody try...
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_068やめときな、本当に関わらない方がいいぜ。
仕事の邪魔をした者は、タダじゃ済まなかったって話だ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_069<tab>Worry not, Marcechamp! Your words of warning have not fallen on deaf ears! But I am the deftarm, and I must do what needs be done! Is that not so, Master!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_069こっちだって、受けた依頼は最後までこなさなきゃならない。
大丈夫、オイラ、そんなヤツに負けないよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_070<tab>Heh. If you're itchin' to get your head blown off your shoulders, who am I to stop you? Your man was last seen headin' for the western highlands of Coerthas. Just don't come cryin' to me when the hunter becomes the hunted!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_070……どうしてもってんなら、しょうがねぇな。
奴はここから、クルザス西部高地へ向かったようだぜ。
いいか、忠告はしたぞ……俺は今度は助けねえからな！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_071<tab><click> <click> Thank you, friend, and worry not! Between Master and myself, we will be more than a match for this masked menace!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_071シシシシシ……ありがとよ！
もう、みんなの手は煩わせないさ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_072<tab>Mind you, Master, I do not wish to rely overmuch on your aid. I accepted this job from the moogles, and I intend to see it done with my own hand. That said, I would ask you to accompany me for...moral support. You understand, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_072なんて言いながら、相変わらず師匠の手は借りてるけどな……。
でも、この依頼は、できるだけオイラの力でこなしたいから、
師匠もあまり手出ししないでほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_073<tab>Excellent! And with that, let us be off to Coerthas! Perhaps our friend Jantellot will have some news for us upon our arrival. Yes, surely he will!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_073よし、次はクルザス西部高地だな。
それじゃあ、聖フィネア連隊の露営地へ行って、
「ジャントゥロー」に聞いてみることにしよう！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_075<tab>Just between you and me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... This man's dangerous─no doubtin' that─but so long as you stick by the deftarm's side, I reckon the two o' you will come out of it with no more than a couple o' scratches. Just don't let your guard down, eh?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_MARCECHAMP_000_075実を言うと、俺も散々脅かしながら、
お前さんがついていれば、大丈夫だろうとは思ってたよ。
まあ、それでも「仮面の冒険者」には用心するこったな……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_080<tab>Ah, 'tis you. Forgive me, but a pressing matter requires my undivided attention at the moment. If you need something of me, pray return on the morrow.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_080ああ、胸クソ悪いぜまったく……。
あぁん、お前か、何の用で来たんだ？
こっちは気が立ってるんで、またにしてくれないか……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_081<tab><click> <click> Please listen, Jantellot! For a pressing matter requires our attention as well! Yes, very pressing!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_081シシシシシ……まあ、そう言うなよ、
ジャントゥローに聞きたいことがあるんだ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_082<tab>On behalf of the moogles of Moghome, we have come to Coerthas in pursuit of a certain adventurer. He wears a mask on his face and wields a pistol in his hand. Perhaps you have seen such a man?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_082モーグリ族の依頼で、「仮面の冒険者」を追っているんだけど、
この辺りで、それらしき男を見かけてないかい？

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_083<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Seen<var 1A 01 /var> him, you say!? Aye, I caught a glimpse... I arrived just in time to see him nigh blast the head off one of my loyal men before commandeering our brand-new manacutter and flying off in it to the Fury knows where!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_083「仮面の冒険者」だと、蟹野郎っ！？
たったいま、そいつに俺の部下が半殺しにされたところだよ！
そのうえ、連隊で買ったばかりのマナカッターまで奪われたんだ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_084<tab>You will forgive me if I am somewhat on edge. We scrimped and saved what little coin we could muster, and waited months on end until this vessel was available...only to see it spirited away from us the selfsame day! All while I could do nothing but look on like a helpless half-wit!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_084皇都やヴァスの塚との行き来が楽になればと、
なけなしの金を出しあい、予約待ちしてやっと手に入れたんだ。
それが、あっさり行きずりの男に奪われたんだぞ、チクショウめ！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_085<tab>At least I emerged from the episode unscathed, which is more than I can say for my subordinate. Serves him right, though. Maybe when his wounds heal he'll think twice before picking a fight with a hardened criminal in a caelumtree wine-induced stupor.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_085まあ、もとはといえば……
七天樹の果実酒で悪酔いした部下が、ケンカを売ったんだがな……。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_086<tab>You heard me right─ridiculous mask or no, that man isn't one to be trifled with. I know not how well these moogles are paying you, but I highly doubt that the reward is worth your life.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_086それにしても、その強さときたら半端なかった。
依頼だかなんだか知らねえが、奴とは関わらない方が身のためだぜ。

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_087<tab><click> <click> This is not a matter of coin, but one of trust and duty! What is an adventurer worth if his word counts for nothing? Nothing, I say! Yes, the deftarm will see this job done! Now tell me, which way did the masked man go?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_087シシシシシ……オイラは、受けた依頼は必ずこなすんだ。
その後、「仮面の冒険者」はどこへ向かったんだ？

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_088<tab>Bwahaha! You have spirit, I will give you that. Adventuring sounds to be a thankless job, but I wish you the best in it. Your man─and my manacutter─were last sighted heading for the Sea of Clouds. Do try to stay alive, won't you?
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_JANTELLOT_000_088けっ……冒険者ってのも大変だな。
奴はマナカッターに乗って、アバラシア雲海の方へ飛んでいったよ。
……まあ、せいぜい死ぬなよ、骨なし蟹野郎！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_089<tab><click> <click> Thank you, friend, and worry not for me! The deftarm has the courage and conviction of a hundred of your men! We will see this merciless marauder brought to justice!
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_089シシシシシ……ありがとよ！
……まあ、せいぜい祈っとけ、殻なし猿野郎！

source: TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_090<tab><click> <click> You don't suppose this masked man truly is as dangerous as our friends suggest, do you, Master? I cannot help but feel like they are underestimating our abilities. Anyhow, let us confer in private and form a plan of attack.
target:
TEXT_BANALL120_02383_UDEKIKI_000_090シシシシシ……どうやら「仮面の冒険者」は、相当強いみたいだね。
でも、オイラ負けないぞ、この依頼を最後までこなしてやるんだ！
よし、すぐそこで作戦会議をしよう。
